tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE beach_clean_up_sites (
    site_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date_cleaned DATE NOT NULL,
    plastic_weight_kg DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE BeachCleanupSites ( site_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, site_name STRING, location STRING, plastic_waste_collected INT )
CREATE TABLE Volunteers ( volunteer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, volunteer_name STRING, volunteer_email STRING, site_id UUID )
CREATE TABLE PlasticItems ( item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, item_name STRING, item_category STRING, item_quantity INT, site_id UUID )
CREATE TABLE CleanupReports ( report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, site_id UUID, volunteer_id UUID, report_date DATE, total_waste_collected INT )

CREATE TABLE PlasticWasteData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT NOT NULL,
  plastic_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  weight_kg DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES BeachCleanupSites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CleanupVolunteers (
  volunteer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  volunteer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  site_id INT NOT NULL,
  hours_spent FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES BeachCleanupSites(site_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentAssignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  site_id INT NOT NULL,
  assignment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES CleanupEquipment(equipment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES BeachCleanupSites(site_id)
);
